subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Dale Earnhardt Jr. announced Wednesday that he would race for Hendrick Motorsports beginning in 2008, and that means he and Jeff Gordon — the anti-Earnhardt — will be teammates.
snippet: Dale Earnhardt Jr. announced Wednesday that he would race for Hendrick Motorsports beginning in 2008, and that means he and Jeff Gordon — the anti-Earnhardt — will be teammates.
